stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the behavior of this code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

for (int x = 1; x <= 3; x++)
{
   for (int y = 5; y > 1; y--)
   {
      System.out.print("*");
   }
}

choicesHtml: The print statement is executed 7 times because the outer loop iterates 3 times and the inner loop iterates 4 times.
The print statement is executed 8 times because the outer loop iterates 3 times and the inner loop iterates 5 times.
The print statement is executed 12 times because the outer loop iterates 3 times and the inner loop iterates 4 times for each iteration of the outer loop.
The print statement is executed 15 times because the outer loop iterates 3 times and the inner loop iterates 5 times for each iteration of the outer loop.
